SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: Both requirements focus on enhancing usability for users with varying capabilities and environmental constraints.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Requirement P-005-NFR-001 emphasizes a user-friendly interface for older adults, while P-006-FR-005 primarily addresses functionality in low-connectivity scenarios.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Enhanced Usability Features
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide an intuitive interface and offline functionalities to accommodate users of varying technical abilities and ensure usability in low-connectivity environments.

Conflicts.PersonaConflict: Compliance Officer vs. Older Adult User
Conflicts.Note: Requirement P-003-FR-005 prioritizes compliance mechanisms that may complicate user interactions, potentially conflicting with the simplicity required for older adults as described in P-005-NFR-001.
